infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to upload and manage property images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to capture property photos and videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs permission to save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to schedule property viewings and appointments.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to reminders to help you manage follow-ups and tasks.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to your microphone to record property videos and use voice commands.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app needs speech recognition to allow you to command Zien with your voice.

plugins.photosPermission: Zien needs access to your photo library to upload and manage property images.
plugins.cameraPermission: Zien needs access to your camera to capture property photos.
